q_ch: 列出Advanced Sewers在2024年4月到5月的工作任务。
q_en: List the work tasks of Advanced Sewers from April to May 2024.
gt:
Sure! Here are the work tasks for the "Advanced Sewers" group from April to May 2024. Let's take a look at what they've been up to! 🧵✨

| Task ID | Start Date  | End Date    | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status       |
|---------|-------------|-------------|----------------|------------------|--------------|
| 16      | 2024-04-10  | 2024-05-07  | 200            | 200              | Completed ✅ |
| 20      | 2024-04-15  | 2024-05-07  | 90             | 90               | Completed ✅ |
| 21      | 2024-04-04  | 2024-04-12  | 85             | 85               | Completed ✅ |
| 22      | 2024-04-09  | 2024-04-22  | 115            | 60               | In Progress 🔄 |

Looks like they've been busy bees! 🐝 If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group with the name "Advanced Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT * FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '8' AND start_time >= '2024-04-01' AND end_time <= '2024-05-31';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks for the working group "Advanced Sewers" from April to May 2024
